sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Disable Report Builder and force use Report Designer when Polaris is ON</description> <name>Disable report builder when Polaris ON</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_properties'); gr.addQuery('name','glide.ui.report.old_report_builder'); gr.addQuery('value',true); gr.query();
if (gr.next()) { gr.value = false; gr.update(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-07-06 12:49:19</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5ebeb0f77301301070e1f988caf6a779</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Disable report builder when Polaris ON</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Unified Navigation Admin Configuration" source="com.glide.polaris.admin.configuration">7dbbf4a43c35311068bcf327dfe37f50</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_5ebeb0f77301301070e1f988caf6a779</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-07-06 12:49:19</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Disable report builder when Polaris ON
